event = {
	id = 12001
	random = no
	country = JAP
	trigger = {
			OR = {
					event = 130001
					event = 7
			}
			control = { province = 2629 data = -2 }
			control = { province = 2630 data = -2 }
			control = { province = 2631 data = -2 }
			control = { province = 2632 data = -2 }
			control = { province = 2633 data = -2 }
			control = { province = 2634 data = -2 }
			control = { province = 2635 data = -2 }
	}

	name = "九州地方の壊滅"
	desc = "EVT_12001_DESC"

	date = { day = 0 month = 0 year = 1973 }
	offset = 100
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = 11 year = 3000 }

	action_a = {
		name = "なんということだ……"
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 2629 value = -20 }
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 2630 value = -20 }
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 2631 value = -20 }
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 2632 value = -20 }
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 2633 value = -20 }
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 2634 value = -20 }
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 2635 value = -20 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 2629 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 2630 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 2631 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 2632 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 2633 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 2634 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 2635 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = coastal_fort where = 2629 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = coastal_fort where = 2630 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = coastal_fort where = 2631 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = coastal_fort where = 2632 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = coastal_fort where = 2633 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = coastal_fort where = 2634 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = coastal_fort where = 2635 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = land_fort where = 2629 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = land_fort where = 2630 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = land_fort where = 2631 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = land_fort where = 2632 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = land_fort where = 2633 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = land_fort where = 2634 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = land_fort where = 2635 value = -5 }
		#command = { type = construct which = flak where = 2629 value = -5 }
		#command = { type = construct which = flak where = 2630 value = -5 }
		#command = { type = construct which = flak where = 2631 value = -5 }
		#command = { type = construct which = flak where = 2632 value = -5 }
		#command = { type = construct which = flak where = 2633 value = -5 }
		#command = { type = construct which = flak where = 2634 value = -5 }
		#command = { type = construct which = flak where = 2635 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = air_base where = 2629 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = air_base where = 2630 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = air_base where = 2631 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = air_base where = 2632 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = air_base where = 2633 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = air_base where = 2634 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = air_base where = 2635 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = naval_base where = 2629 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = naval_base where = 2630 value = -5 }

		command = { type = construct which = naval_base where = 2632 value = -5 }

		command = { type = construct which = naval_base where = 2635 value = -5 }
		command = { type = construct which = radar_station where = 2629 value = -5 }

		command = { type = construct which = radar_station where = 2634 value = -5 }
